flavorText: Never be afraid to look where others can't—or won't.

foreignData.flavorText: Scheue dich nie davor, dorthin zu schauen, wo andere nicht hinschauen können — oder wollen.
foreignData.name: Luzide Träume
foreignData.text: Ziehe X Karten, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Kartentypen in deinem Friedhof ist.

foreignData.flavorText: Jamás temas mirar donde otros no pueden o no quieren.
foreignData.name: Sueños lúcidos
foreignData.text: Roba X cartas, donde X es la cantidad de tipos de cartas entre las cartas de tu cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: N'ayez pas peur de regarder là où les autres ne peuvent pas aller, ou refusent d'aller.
foreignData.name: Rêves lucides
foreignData.text: Piochez X cartes, X étant le nombre de types de carte parmi les cartes de votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Non avere mai paura di guardare dove gli altri non possono o non vogliono.
foreignData.name: Sogni Lucidi
foreignData.text: Pesca X carte, dove X è il numero di tipi di carta tra le carte nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 他人には見ることのできない情景を恐れてはならない。もしくは見ようとしない情景を。
foreignData.name: 明晰夢
foreignData.text: カードＸ枚を引く。Ｘはあなたの墓地にあるカードの中のカード・タイプの種類数に等しい。

foreignData.flavorText: 다른 사람들이 보지 못하는 곳—아니면 보지 않는 곳—을 보는 일을 두려워하지 마라.
foreignData.name: 자각몽
foreignData.text: 카드 X장을 뽑는다. X는 당신의 무덤에 있는 카드들이 가진 카드 유형의 수이다.

foreignData.flavorText: Jamais tenha medo de olhar para onde os outros não conseguem, ou não querem.
foreignData.name: Sonhos Lúcidos
foreignData.text: Compre X cards, sendo X o número de tipos de card entre os dos cards em seu cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: Никогда не бойся смотреть туда, куда другие не могут... или не хотят.
foreignData.name: Яркие Сны
foreignData.text: Возьмите Х карт, где X — количество типов карт среди карт на вашем кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 永远别害怕向他人无法或不敢关注的地方探索。
foreignData.name: 清明梦
foreignData.text: 抓X张牌，X为你坟墓场中牌的牌张类别数量。

foreignData.flavorText: 永遠別害怕向他人無法或不敢關注的地方探索。
foreignData.name: 清明夢
foreignData.text: 抽X張牌，X為你墳墓場中牌的牌張類別數量。

name: Lucid Dreams
originalText: Draw X cards, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Card types that can appear on cards in a graveyard include artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal. Legendary, basic, and snow are supertypes, not card types; Vedalken and Wizard are subtypes, not card types.
Lucid Dreams is still on the stack and not in your graveyard as you calculate the value of X.
A card can have more than one type. For example, an artifact creature in your graveyard counts as both types for Lucid Dreams' effect.

text: Draw X cards, where X is the number of card types among cards in your graveyard.
